verbose_text: In conclusion, HBx upregulates the Bax / Bcl-2 ratio by activating the JAK2 / STAT3 signaling pathway to cause renal tubular epithelial cell apoptosis, and it is possibly involved in the pathogenic mechanism of nephridial tissue damage caused by HBV.
evidence: HBx upregulates the Bax/Bcl-2 ratio by activating the JAK2/STAT3
